video_caption: In the video, a man wearing a red cap and a maroon shirt is giving a presentation in a room filled with shelves of medical supplies. He stands in front of a large screen displaying a slide titled "EXPLAINABLE AI FOR DETECTION OF PNEUMONIA FROM X-RAY IMAGES," which features a diagram of an X-ray image and a bar chart. The presenter gestures with his hands as he speaks, engaging with the audience. The slide then transitions to a new one titled "IMPLEMENTATION BARRIERS," accompanied by a graphic of three hexagons. The presenter continues to speak, pointing to the slide and emphasizing the points being discussed. The room is well-lit, and the audience is seated in front of the presenter, attentively watching the presentation. The atmosphere is professional and focused on the topic of AI in medical imaging.

In the video, a man wearing a red shirt and a red cap is giving a presentation in a room filled with shelves of medical supplies. He stands in front of a large screen displaying the title "OUR IDEA" with two bullet points: "Visualizing the AI's own 'methodology'" and "Visualizing it in a Radiology-based framework." The presenter uses hand gestures to emphasize his points, occasionally pointing to the screen to highlight specific ideas. The audience, partially visible in the foreground, appears engaged, with some members wearing masks. The room is well-lit, and the AV equipment is visible on a shelf to the right of the presenter. The atmosphere is professional and focused on the topic of AI visualization in radiology.

In a professional setting, a man wearing a maroon shirt and a red cap stands in front of a projector screen, presenting to an audience. The screen displays slides with medical images and text, including phrases like "OUR IDEA," "Visualizing the AI's own methodology," and "Visualizing It In a Radiology-based framework." The presenter uses hand gestures to emphasize points, pointing at the screen and moving around the room. The background features shelves filled with labeled boxes, and a sign reading "AV equipment" is visible. The audience, partially visible, appears engaged. The presentation includes detailed medical images, such as chest X-rays, with annotations and heat maps, and the presenter explains the significance of these visuals, pointing to specific areas on the slides. The atmosphere is educational and focused, with the presenter actively engaging with the audience through his gestures and explanations.

In a medical setting, a man wearing a maroon shirt and a red cap stands in front of a screen displaying two chest X-rays labeled "CNN OG GRAD-CAM." He gestures towards the images, explaining their significance to an audience seated in front of him. The room is filled with shelves of medical supplies, and a sign reading "AV equipment" is visible in the background. The presenter uses hand movements to emphasize points, occasionally pointing at the X-rays and making explanatory gestures. The audience, including a person with gray hair, listens attentively. The scene transitions to a slide titled "AZGC: 'AUTOMATIC ZONE DIVISION OF GRAD-CAMS,'" featuring a bar graph and an X-ray image divided into zones, indicating a shift in the presentation's focus to a new topic. The presenter continues to engage with the audience, maintaining a professional and informative atmosphere throughout the presentation.

The video features a man in a maroon shirt and red cap presenting a slide titled "AZGC: 'AUTOMATIC ZONE DIVISION OF GRAD-CAMS'" in a classroom setting. The slide displays a bar graph with various zones and a corresponding X-ray image. The presenter uses hand gestures to emphasize points while explaining the content. The classroom is equipped with shelves filled with labeled boxes, a laptop, and a water bottle on a table. The audience, consisting of individuals with gray hair, is seated and attentively watching the presentation. The presenter points to different parts of the slide, indicating specific zones and their corresponding values, and uses a remote control to navigate through the presentation. The video captures the presenter's dynamic engagement with the audience, highlighting the educational atmosphere of the classroom.

In the video, a man wearing a maroon shirt and a red beanie is presenting in a room filled with shelves of medical supplies. He stands in front of a large projection screen displaying a slide titled "AIZGC: 'AUTOMATIC ZONE DIVISION OF GRAD-CAMS'" with a bar graph and an X-ray image of a chest. The presenter gestures towards the screen, pointing at different parts of the graph and the X-ray, explaining the content to an audience seated in front of him. The room is well-lit, and the atmosphere appears to be that of a professional or educational setting. The presenter's facial expressions and body language suggest he is actively engaged in conveying information. The slide's text and visuals are clearly visible, indicating a focus on medical imaging analysis. The audience, partially visible in the foreground, seems attentive to the presentation. The presenter's gestures and the slide's content suggest a detailed explanation of the Automatic Zone Division of Grad-CAMs, a technique likely used in medical imaging to highlight areas of interest in X-rays.

In the video, a man wearing a maroon shirt and a red cap is giving a presentation in a room filled with shelves of medical supplies. He is standing in front of a large screen displaying a slide titled "AZGC: 'AUTOMATIC ZONE DIVISION OF GRAD-CAMS'" with a bar graph and an X-ray image of a chest. The man gestures towards the screen, pointing at different parts of the slide, and appears to be explaining the content to an audience seated in front of him. The room has a professional atmosphere, with a sign labeled "AV equipment" visible in the background, indicating the presence of audio-visual equipment. The man's facial expressions and body language suggest he is engaged in his presentation, emphasizing key points on the slide. The audience is partially visible, with the back of their heads and shoulders shown, indicating their attention towards the speaker. The video transitions to a close-up of the slide, showing detailed images of a normal chest X-ray, a Grad-CAM heatmap, and a segmented chest X-ray with zones labeled. The slide also includes a bar graph with different zones and their corresponding values, providing a visual representation of the data being discussed. The overall setting and content suggest an educational or professional environment focused on medical imaging and analysis.

The video features a man in a maroon shirt and red cap presenting in front of a large screen displaying medical images and data. The screen shows three chest X-ray images labeled "Normal," "Grad-CAM Heatmap," and "Zones," along with a bar graph indicating "Right Lung Lower" as the highest value. The presenter gestures towards the screen, pointing at the images and the graph, while explaining the data. The background includes shelves filled with medical supplies and a sign reading "AV equipment." The audience, visible in the foreground, appears engaged, with some members having gray hair. The presenter uses hand gestures to emphasize points, occasionally raising his arms and pointing upwards. The setting suggests a professional environment, likely a medical or educational facility, where the presenter is discussing the significance of the displayed medical data.

In a classroom setting, a man wearing a maroon shirt and a red cap stands in front of a large screen displaying medical images and graphs. He gestures animatedly, pointing at the screen and explaining the content to an audience seated in front of him. The screen shows X-ray images of lungs, heatmaps, and bar graphs labeled with terms like "Normal," "Grad-CAM Heatmap," and "Zones," along with numerical data and percentages. The room is filled with shelves of medical supplies, and a sign reading "AV equipment" is visible in the background. The man appears to be giving a detailed presentation, using hand movements to emphasize key points. The audience, consisting of older individuals, listens attentively as the presenter continues to explain the medical data displayed on the screen.

In a classroom setting, a man wearing a red cap and a maroon shirt stands in front of a projector screen displaying a Windows desktop with the title "BRUGERVENDELIG GUI" (User-Friendly GUI). He gestures towards the screen, which shows a file explorer window with various folders and files. The room is filled with shelves containing numerous labeled boxes, and a sign reading "AV equipment" is visible in the background. The man appears to be explaining the GUI, pointing at different elements on the screen. The camera then zooms in on the screen, showing a detailed view of the file explorer window and the desktop icons. The man continues to interact with the laptop on the table, demonstrating the GUI's features. The video transitions to a close-up of the desktop, highlighting the GUI interface with a dark background and orange accents. The interface includes a list of files and folders, a search bar, and a large black area, possibly for displaying content. The man's hand is seen pointing at the screen, emphasizing specific elements. The video concludes with a detailed view of the GUI interface, showing a bar chart and images of a human chest with highlighted areas, indicating a medical or diagnostic application. The interface is labeled with various sections, including "Prognosis," "Model prediction," and "Model accuracy," suggesting the GUI's functionality in medical analysis.

In the video, a man wearing a red cap and a maroon shirt is presenting a user-friendly GUI (Graphical User Interface) to an audience in a room filled with shelves of equipment. The presentation begins with a slide titled "BRUGERVENDELIG GUI" (User-Friendly GUI) displaying various medical images and data, including X-ray images of a human chest and a bar graph. The presenter gestures towards the screen, explaining the interface's features. The slide transitions to show different GUI elements, including a file explorer window and a blank interface, as the presenter continues to explain and point out specific features. The audience, consisting of individuals with gray hair, attentively watches the presentation. The presenter concludes with a slide that reads "THANK YOU FOR YOUR ATTENTION," signaling the end of the presentation. Throughout the video, the presenter maintains an engaging demeanor, using hand gestures to emphasize key points and interact with the audience.

The presenter gestures and speaks, explaining the features of the GUI, which is titled "BRUGERVENDELIG GUI" (User-Friendly GUI). The room is equipped with AV equipment, including a laptop and a microphone, and the atmosphere is educational and focused. The presenter's gestures and the changing slides on the screen indicate a dynamic and informative presentation.
